title: Early FF
body: Has anyone else experienced frustrating wait time to get into a game only for it to ff in the first few minutes and you are back in Q again?

replies.body: would you rather frustrating wait times, have an afk and play 4v5 till you /ff in 20mins and remake anyways?

> [{quoted}](name=ToTaL ViRGiN,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=s3ZGmbal,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-06-29T02:45:18.267+0000)
>
> would you rather frustrating wait times, have an afk and play 4v5 till you /ff in 20mins and remake anyways?

Totally agree.
Well people should learn to play support rather go feeding in mid or top lane
